sentences.en: As long as most people are happy to have the monarchy, the abolitionist position is an arrogant fantasy.
sentences.cn: 只要大多数人还乐意保留君主制，废除它的主张就是痴人说梦。

sentences.en: Children use fantasy to explore worrying aspects of real life.
sentences.cn: 孩子们用幻想来探索实际生活中令人不安的各种事情。

sentences.en: Enough of fantasy, the workaday world awaited him.
sentences.cn: 天马行空地幻想了一番之后，等待他的是平淡无奇的现实世界。

sentences.en: Everyone should indulge in fantasy on occasion.
sentences.cn: 每个人都应偶尔沉浸在想像之中.

sentences.en: Falling in love the first time is all froth and fantasy.
sentences.cn: 初恋完全是一场虚幻的美梦。

sentences.en: Haskins said he has been playing fantasy baseball for the past five years.
sentences.cn: 哈斯金斯说过去5年他一直在玩虚拟棒球。

sentences.en: He began living out his rock "n" roll fantasy during his last year in law school.
sentences.cn: 在法学院的最后一年，他开始着手实践自己的摇滚梦想。

sentences.en: He lived in a fantasy world of his own, even as a small boy.
sentences.cn: 甚至还是个小孩子的时候，他就生活在一个幻想世界里。

sentences.en: I used to have fantasies about living in Paris with an artist.
sentences.cn: 我过去常幻想着在巴黎与一位艺术家同住。

sentences.en: I was weaned on a regular diet of Hollywood fantasy.
sentences.cn: 我从小就时常看好莱坞幻想片.

sentences.en: She clings to a romantic fantasy of wedded bliss.
sentences.cn: 她沉醉于婚后幸福的浪漫幻想。

sentences.en: She invents fantasy lives for her own vicarious pleasure.
sentences.cn: 她幻想过着各种奇妙的生活，从想入非非中获得乐趣。

sentences.en: The film starts off realistically and then develops into a ridiculous fantasy.
sentences.cn: 电影以写实开头，然后却发展成为荒诞的幻想。

sentences.en: The film tries to be all things to all men— comedy, romance, fantasy, and satire.
sentences.cn: 这部电影试图面面俱到——既是喜剧、爱情剧、梦幻剧，还想是讽刺剧。

sentences.en: The story is a magical mix of fantasy and reality.
sentences.cn: 这个故事是幻想与现实的奇妙结合。

sentences.en: There will be more work to do, not less. Bang goes the fantasy of retirement at 35.
sentences.cn: 工作只会增加，不会减少。梦想着35岁退休是彻底没戏了。

sentences.en: They live in fantasy worlds which make Euro Disney seem uninventive.
sentences.cn: 他们生活在幻想的世界里，相形之下连欧洲迪士尼乐园都显得毫无创意。

sentences.en: Young children sometimes can’t distinguish between fantasy and reality.
sentences.cn: 小孩子有时不能区分幻想与现实。

trans.tran_en: Fantasy football, baseball, or another sport is a game in which players choose an imaginary team and score points based on the actual performances of the members of their team in real games
an exciting and unusual experience or situation you imagine happening to you, but which will probably never happen
